content:
Back on track: 52/96, or 54% accuracy overall this past week. We’ve now made a number of improvements to the algorithm, and we’re excited to see how our performance continues from here on out. New predictions are posted.

Point spread # games Accuracy
<= 1 34 53%
<=2 16 56%
<=5 26 50%
>5 20 60%
